cscd211Classes

Class InventoryItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • cscd211Classes.InventoryItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<InventoryItem>

    public class InventoryItem
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<InventoryItem>
    An Inventory Item which contains an Item reference, the price of the item, and the number of items on hand (quantity)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Item item
      A reference to an Item
      private double price
      The price of each item
      private int quantity
      The number of each item that is currently on hand

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InventoryItem(java.lang.String name, int SKU, int quantity, double price)
      Create an InventoryItem by first creating this item and then setting the quantity and the price

    • Constructor Detail

      • InventoryItem

        public InventoryItem(java.lang.String name,
                     int SKU,
                     int quantity,
                     double price)
        Create an InventoryItem by first creating this item and then setting the quantity and the price
        Parameters:
        name - Representing the Item's name
        SKU - Representing the Item's SKU
        quantity - Representing the total quantity on hand of this item
        price - Representing the price of this item
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if name is null or empty, quantity is < 1 or price < 0.01

    • Method Detail

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(InventoryItem anotherItem)
        The compareTo method first compares this item to anotherItem. If the item(s) are the same then it compares quantity and if the quantities are the same it will compare price.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<InventoryItem>
        Parameters:
        anotherItem - Representing the InventoryItem to be compared to this InventoryItem
        Returns:
        int - The value 0 if the argument anotherItem is equal to this InventoryItem; a value less than 0 if this InventoryItem is less than anotherInventoryItem; and a value greater than 0 if this InventoryItem is greater than the InventoryItem argument.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if anotherItem is null

        Returns the value of this quantity

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns the String repesentation of the InventoryItem
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        String - In the form Name: this name \nSKU this Item's SKU \nQuantity this InventoryItem's quantity \nPrice this InventoryItem's price
